description: This file defines a React functional component 'QualityInspectionList' that displays a list of inspections, allows users to execute inspections via a checklist UI, and facilitates raising non-conformance (NC) reports directly from the inspection dialog.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Initializes the dialog with a selected inspection, resetting results, notes, and status.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles submission of the inspection results, including notes and pass/fail status.

methods.name: raiseNc
methods.description: Triggers raising a Non-Conformance report based on the current inspection and notes.

methods.name: renderItem
methods.description: Renders individual checklist items based on their type (boolean, number, text).
